text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi जो साथ दे दे सारा इंडिया फिर से मुस्कुराए  इंडिया @PMOIndia @narendramodi @bjp  may god bless them all those who are with  us In fight with covid-19 # be a Superhero And save others  and your  life  By staying at home #GoCoronaGo
